blueprint_book.label: Space Exploration (v0.8)
blueprint_book.description:
Blueprints for Space Exploration games that use the "self building" system from my self-building-factory:
https://factorioprints.com/view/-MNZWdWosuqr3vtaC2hD

V 0.8:
* Solar (128MW)!
* Kovarex/Nuclear (2.4GW)!
* Modules!
* Imported construction sites.
* Added "mall" accounting to Belts.
* Better production prioritization in Refinery.
* Removed unnecessary balancers from Refinery.
* Hub alert for low bot count (attrition).
